nodes.text: KSE Firespray was a painting available in the galaxy sometime after the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War, a conflict between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. It depicted a Firespray-31-class patrol and attack craft—a starship designed by Kuat Systems Engineering—patrolling an asteroid field.

KSE Firespray was a painting that appeared in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, which was released on June 26, 2003 and shut down on December 15, 2011. It was rewarded to players as part of the game's The Empire Strikes Back 30th Anniversary Celebration in May 2010. Players received a container in their inventory after a "Double Everything Weekend"—which doubled the gain rate of experience points and other currency—and could use the container to be gifted with one of three paintings. The other two were X-Wing and Imperial Star Destroyer. The player could use the painting in their house as decoration. The artwork for the painting comes from the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game expansion set Galactic Hunters, specifically the card for the flagship of notorious bounty hunters Jango and Boba Fett, Slave I.
